page.title: 14EDUCATION.
page.content: In our square there are two playgroups, catering for 26 under fives.One is a community run playgroup and the other is held at{Sunnysides, the{Childrens home at Middlehill. There is one primary school in the village but older children must travel to{Bath}or{Corsham,}for the nearest comprehensive schools.Adult education is provided in{Box}school by {Chippenham Technical College}and{The {Workers Educational Association.}The subjects range from rural crafts to astronomy and enjoying music to the study of birds.
